name: Magnet Racer (ZacFierce)
description:
Go for a fast time! Drive on walls and through speed boosts, but try not to hit the wall! Release your kart's magnetism to drift or gain extra speed on inclines!

Controls:

  • W/S to accelerate/decelerate
  • A/D to steer
  • Space (hold) to release magnetism
  • F5 to restart

Created in 3 hours for Fierce Dev Cafe. Watch live here!
